references.title: Gender stigma awareness is associated with adolescent risky health behaviors

sections.heading: CORRECTION
sections.text:
Correction: Gender stigma awareness is
associated with adolescent risky health
behaviors

sections.heading: Karen Kwaning, Mitchell Wong, Kulwant Dosanjh, Christopher Biely, Rebecca Dudovitz
sections.text:
There is an error in Table 1. The parameter “Participated in AVID” should have the N (%)/Mean SD values of “115 (27.9%)”, not “116 (28.2%)”. Please see the correct Table 1 here.
